entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
